product_name: Imagine Surf Icon GC Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 2"
long_description: The Icon offers generous volume and width through the center to boost confidence on flat water, but really shines in the surf thanks to its progressive rocker and thinned out nose and tail.
short_description: The Icon offers generous volume and width through the center to boost confidence on flat water, but really shines in the surf thanks to its progressive rocker and thinned out nose and tail.
